description: Developed a novel deep learning model for medical image classification using PyTorch, achieving 95% accuracy in detecting anomalies, exceeding the previous model's performance by 15%.
Deployed the model to a cloud-based platform, enabling real-time processing of medical images with an average latency of under 200ms, improving diagnostic speed by 40%.
Optimized model performance by implementing a custom loss function and data augmentation techniques, reducing training time by 30% and improving resource utilization by 25%.
Built and deployed a machine learning model for predicting patient risk using Python and TensorFlow, resulting in a 10% reduction in hospital readmission rates.
Collaborated with a team of clinicians to collect and preprocess medical data, ensuring data quality and integrity, which led to a 5% increase in model accuracy.
Developed data visualization dashboards to monitor model performance and identify areas for improvement, facilitating proactive adjustments and improvements to the model's accuracy.
Conducted research on novel deep learning architectures for medical image analysis, resulting in a publication in a peer-reviewed journal.
Developed a prototype system for automated detection of diabetic retinopathy using medical imaging data, achieving 90% accuracy in detecting the disease.
Presented research findings at international conferences, contributing to advancements in the field of AI in healthcare.

projects.name: Breast Cancer Classification
description: Developed an Artificial Neural Network (ANN) model for breast cancer classification, achieving 95% accuracy in distinguishing between benign and malignant tumors using TensorFlow and a publicly available dataset.
Improved diagnostic accuracy by implementing data augmentation techniques to address class imbalance, resulting in a 10% reduction in false negatives.
Deployed the model using Flask, creating a user-friendly web application for healthcare professionals to easily access and utilize the model for preliminary diagnosis.

projects.name: Face Recognition System
description: Designed and implemented a facial recognition system for student attendance tracking, leveraging FaceNet for facial feature extraction and achieving 92% accuracy in identifying students.
Reduced manual attendance tracking time by 75% by automating the process, freeing up administrative staff for other tasks and saving the institution valuable time and resources.
Improved the system's robustness by implementing a real-time face detection algorithm using OpenCV, ensuring accurate attendance recording even in challenging lighting conditions.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
description: Built a content-based movie recommendation system using NLP and cosine similarity, achieving an average recommendation accuracy of 85% based on user ratings.
Enhanced the system's performance by implementing collaborative filtering to incorporate user preferences and viewing history, improving recommendation relevance by 15%.
Improved user engagement by creating a user-friendly interface and providing personalized movie suggestions, leading to a 20% increase in user interaction and movie views.

education.university: Rajiv Gandhi University of Knowledge and Technologies

certifications.name: Programming for Everybody (Getting Started with Python)

achievements: Developed a novel machine learning model using TensorFlow that improved the accuracy of medical image diagnostics by 15%, as measured by AUC.
Deployed a real-time AI model for healthcare diagnostics, resulting in a 20% reduction in processing time.
Optimized a machine learning model for healthcare diagnostics, reducing resource consumption by 30%.
Successfully worked with large medical imaging datasets (over 1TB) using Python and PyTorch to train and evaluate robust machine learning models.
keywords: Machine Learning, AI, Healthcare, Diagnostics, Model Development, Deployment, Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Medical Imaging, Real-time Performance, Scalable Solutions
